data.actual_result: Your profile picture resolution drops drastically
data.expected_result: The image should remain with the same resolution as if it had been uploaded from the desktop version.
data.short_description: Profile picture resolution drops drastically on iOS
data.steps_to_repro: -  Update your profile pic from Desktop discord - Use Ayana bot to be able to see and download that same pic - Update your profile pic from iOS Discord - Use the same bot again, and it the resolution will drop even more than compared to desktop
